title: psg : PSG vs Nantes : Prediction , live telecast , live stream of Lionel Messi , Kylian Mbappé next match
body_text:
A commanding 3-0 victory in the Le Classique trip to Marseille last weekend gave PSG an eight-point lead in the fight for the championship, and Christophe Galtier will now divide his attention between winning the league and remaining in Europe.
When does PSG vs. Nantes start?
This Ligue 1 match will begin on Saturday, March 4 at 9:00 p.m. local time at Parc des Princes.Live TV channel for PSG vs. Nantes
UK: Both BT Sports' TV and online services will provide live coverage of this game.USA: BeIN Sports is airing this game, and beIN Sports CONNECT is providing live streaming.
Canada: FuboTV in Canada will exclusively stream every Ligue 1 game this season via beIN Sports CONNECT.
Australia: Kayo Sports and beIN Sports offer live and on-demand streaming of the Ligue 1 for Australian viewers.
PSG vs Nantes lineups
Presnel Kimpembe is unlikely to play again this year, and the hosts will rest some of their star players because Neymar won't be traveling to Germany.Starting lineup for PSG is as follows (3-5-2): Donnarumma (GK) — Marquinhos, Bitshiabu, Danilo — Mukiele, Vitinha, Zaire-Emery, Ruiz, Mendes — Ekitike, Mbappe
Rico, Letellier, Bernat, Ramos, Soler, Pembele, Gharbi, Housni, and Messi are the substitutes for PSG.
Due to Evann Guessand's withdrawal, former Liverpool midfielder Pedro Chirivella is expected to make a comeback.
Starting lineup for Nantes (4-3-3) is as follows: Lafont (GK) — Centonze, Girotto, Castelletto, Hadjam — Mollet, Chirivella, Moutoussamy — Blas, Delort, Ganago
Descamps (GK), Guessand, Coco, Sissoko, Doucet, Corchia, Simon, Mohamed, and Victor are Nantes substitutes.
PSG vs Nantes prediction
PSG to win 3-1FAQs:
- What are PSG fans called?
The socios - What is Nantes FC nickname?
The Canaries
